item0.name: Everfrost
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
250 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Glaciate: Deal (125+35% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s).
Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

item1.name: Stopwatch
item1.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item2.name: Corrupting Potion
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item4.name: Seeker's Armguard
item4.description:
20 Ability Power
15 Armor
  • Witch's Path: Killing a unit grants 0.5 Armor (max 15).

item5.name: Nashor's Tooth
item5.description:
100 Ability Power
50% Attack Speed
  • Icathian Bite: Attacks apply (15 + 20% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item1.name: Corrupting Potion
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item2.name: Liandry's Anguish
item2.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage based on the target's bonus health (maxed at 1250 bonus health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item1.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
item1.description: Active - Consume: Eat the biscuit to restore 10% missing Health and Mana over 5 seconds. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants 50 maximum Mana.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

item0.name: Dark Seal
item0.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item4.name: Oblivion Orb
item4.description:
30 Ability Power
  • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item1.name: Doran's Ring

70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

25 Magic Resist
  • Adaptive: Killing a unit grants 0.3 Magic Resist (max 9).
